frontMatter.title: Cost Optimization
frontMatter.metaDescription: Focuses on reducing cost. Consider shredding unnecessary waste in platform services, tech debt backlog, or team structure. Look into process improvements.

checklist.question: Have you identified and categorized all your costs?
checklist.expectation: All elements related to operational cost should be clearly visible and should be able to be listed.

checklist.question: Have you considered the cost alternatives for your business activities?
checklist.expectation: Best practices for each cost activity needs to be analyzed and the activity needs to be justified given the alternatives.

checklist.question: Does your spending add value to the product?
checklist.expectation: The product team must understand the ultimate value of the product to the customer. The costing should always add direct or indirect value to the end product.
